pr_title: Fix the way to check if a path is under a sync point

timeline.message: Fix the way to check if a path is under a sync point

timeline.author: madanadit

replies.bodyText: unfortunately not.. activesync tests are hard because local file system does not support it.. i actually wrote a test and then disabled checks for file system type and it passed.. We need to come up with better ways of testing it.
replies.author: yuzhu
